tippz.title: Tippz - Web System
tippz.shortDescription: Web system for freelancer management and dropshipping product sales
tippz.description:
A hub with a range of functionalities, the main one being to serve suppliers who want to sell their products, allowing other users to automatically integrate with their sales channels (Mercado Livre, Amazon, TikTok Shop) to resell products. Its main features are:

• Admin panel with complete management of all data
• Bulk product registration and editing via CSV spreadsheet
• OAuth2 integration with third-party platforms (Google for authentication, Mercado Pago for sales, etc)
• Bulk sending to sales channels
• Freelancer hiring feed for various niches (IT, Design, Digital Marketing, Legal and much more)
• Among others

helicebras.title: Helicebras - Web System

It features a complete presentation of the services offered, with image examples in a carousel, a card explaining the company's trajectory, contact popups and a form for sending quotes.

moonlight.title: Moonlight - Discord
moonlight.shortDescription: Interaction and moderation BOT for a Discord server
moonlight.description:
Multi-function bot used as the main server system, its main features are:

• Points system with shop to get benefits on the server
• Points system includes monitoring in text and voice chats
• Daily reports with hours spent by members in calls
• Spam checks in text chats
• AFK people monitoring in calls
• Robust ticket system with reports and member delegation
• Integration with League of Legends inhouse bot to expand points system
• And much more!

middleman.title: Middleman - Discord
middleman.shortDescription: BOT for sales / purchases using intermediaries in a discord server
middleman.description:
BOT made to assist and facilitate sales on a server, where members can exchange their items using an intermediary during the process, facilitating the collection of information during the purchase ticket process. Its main features are:

• Ticket creation and intuitive and automated support flow
• Integration with payment systems (Mercado Pago and InfinitePay) with automatic payment confirmation
• Records with ranking between members and staff
• Detailed personalized profile with transactions and statistics
• Robust logging system with weekly and monthly reports
• Spending goals systems to reward members and staff attendants
• Public sending of exchange receipts to generate credibility for the server
• Simplified settings panel guiding how to configure the BOT
